attributes.action: only allow members of the armed forces to become the Secretary of State for Defence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the Secretary of State for Defence should have served a term in the armed forces to have credible experience in this field.

Therefore only senior members of the armed forces who receive a life peerage should be appointed Secretary of State for Defence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
